tasks.content: Analyze Board Requests: Synthesize conflicting requirements (CFO's frugality vs. CMO's vision) into cohesive design specification
High-Level Site Structure (Sitemap): Define navigation and key sections including Hero, Monolith System, Products, and Origin Story
Mood & Style Definition: Finalize the 'Glass Cockpit' and 'Skeleton Watch' aesthetic using deep charcoal, introvert-friendly palette
Wireframe Finalization: Lock in 'Hub-and-Spoke' geometry for Hero section with central Founder node and orbiting AI executives
Modal Interface Design: Design interactive modals for 6 AI Executive nodes to detail functional traits without leaving page
Dual-Path Conversion UI: Design 'Join the Beta' (Primary) and 'Read the Manifesto' (Secondary/Newsletter) interface elements
Content Ingestion: Draft and integrate 'Founder Bio' and 'AI Node' descriptive text into design
Careers Page Design: Create single-page layout communicating 'AI-first/No-hiring' narrative
Design-to-Engineering Handoff: Finalize assets for Vite/React/Tailwind stack for Phase 1 'Soft Launch' readiness

design_philosophy: Systems Over Hustle - visual language suggests efficiency, automation, calm utilitarian feel
technical_constraint: Operational expense less than $15/month - lightweight React and Tailwind CSS frontend
